channel.title: RUSTPROP
channel.description: Political messaging with varying degrees of importance, designed by Dana 'Rusty' Teagle, the toronto public libra

item.title: Liberation will require seizing the means of computation. Until we own the servers there are no safe havens in cyberspace.
item.description: personally I don't believe marginalized groups will ever find a corporate-owned platform that is "safe" or "protects them" so long as it is politically accepted and/or profitable to do otherwise
